idea-plugin.name: WebPulse Forecast
idea-plugin.description:
WebPulse Forecast is a powerful tool for web developers working with HTML5 projects. It provides accurate performance estimations and insights to help optimize your web applications.

Key features:
  • Analyzes HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and JSON files in your project
  • Estimates resource usage and performance metrics
  • Detects usage of popular frameworks like React, Vue, Angular, and more
  • Identifies potential performance issues and provides suggestions
  • Supports custom elements and external resource analysis
WebPulse Forecast helps you make informed decisions about your web project's architecture and performance optimizations.
